text:
Delivery Hero AG | Multiple Positions | Berlin, Germany | ONSITE | https://www.deliveryhero.com

Delivery Hero has a lot of positions open, you can reach the career page in the link below.

We have a diverse set of languages(mostly depending on the team) including Python, Go, React, Java, Kotlin, Objective-C, Swift, AWS, Google Cloud.

http://app.jobvite.com/m?3X8k8jwl
